introduction_block.title: Optimize the performance of your websites
introduction_block.introduction: Whatever your field is, the performance of your pages is critical for your users, and thus for your business. Falco helps you to monitor, analyze, and optimize your websites.

leadForm.submit_failed:
An error occurred while submitting your request.

Please try again.
leadForm.error_email_valid: Your email address is not valid

monitoring.title: Daily follow-up
monitoring.description: Falco monitors performances several times a day, and offers a historical overview to pilot their evolution.

analysis.title: Detailed analysis
analysis.description: Falco enables you to access every single detail of each audit, to always have the needed informations.

optimisation.title: Relevant optimisations
optimisation.description: Falco helps you get the most effective optimisations, by following Google recommendations.

faq_block.title: FAQ
faq_block.1st_question: Which metrics can Falco help managing?
faq_block.1st_answer: Falco can measure the Time to Interactive, the Speed Index, the Lighthouse score, the Time to First Byte and other metrics.
faq_block.2nd_question: My website needs authentication, can I still audit it?
faq_block.2nd_answer: Yes, Falco allows scripts in order to go through authentication systems, or to simulate user interactions.
faq_block.3rd_question: Can Falco help to audit Single Page Applications?
faq_block.3rd_answer: Falco is independent of the technology used on your websites, and allows to audit performances and obtain recommendations whatever the stack is.
faq_block.4th_answer: Falco is a tool developed by {theodoLink}, in order to help its clients as well as possible on performance issues.

Audits.pick_right_metrics: How to pick the right metrics? →
Audits.webpagetest_select_date: Choose the date of the audit
Audits.webpagetest_select_dates: Choose the dates of the audits
Audits.lighthouse_note: Note: data provided by Lighthouse may differ from the Dashboard data. This is due to a different audit environment. Diagnostics and opportunities are still relevant, even though the indicated metric improvements may differ from the real results.

WPTMetricFirstViewTTI.name: TTI - Time To Interactive (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewTTI.description: Triggered when CPU computations and network requests are few and far between (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewTTI.name: TTI - Time To Interactive (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewTTI.description: Triggered when CPU computations and network requests are few and far between (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewSpeedIndex.name: Speed Index (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewSpeedIndex.description: Triggered when pixels of the page reach their final position (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewSpeedIndex.name: Speed Index (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewSpeedIndex.description: Triggered when pixels of the page reach their final position (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstPaint.name: First Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstPaint.description: Triggered when the first pixel is drawn on the screen (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstPaint.name: First Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstPaint.description: Triggered when the first pixel is drawn on the screen (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.name: First Meaningful Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.description: Triggered when the “hero” element of the page (a big element at the top center) is visible (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.name: First Meaningful Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.description: Triggered when the “hero” element of the page (a big element at the top center) is visible (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewLoadTime.name: Load Time (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewLoadTime.description: Triggered when network is quiet and page is fully loaded (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewLoadTime.name: Load Time (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewLoadTime.description: Triggered when network is quiet and page is fully loaded (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstContentfulPaint.name: First Contentful Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstContentfulPaint.description: Triggered when the first DOM element (text, image, ...) is drawn on the screen (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstContentfulPaint.name: First Contentful Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstContentfulPaint.description: Triggered when the first DOM element (text, image, ...) is drawn on the screen (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewTimeToFirstByte.name: Time to First Byte (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewTimeToFirstByte.description: Triggered when the browser receives the first byte from the server, usually HTML (for first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewTimeToFirstByte.name: Time to First Byte (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewTimeToFirstByte.description: Triggered when the browser receives the first byte from the server, usually HTML (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricLighthousePerformance.name: Lighthouse Performance Score
WPTMetricLighthousePerformance.description:
Aggregates many of other performance metrics, simulates middle-end device & poor network conditions.
Measured via Dev Tools or https://web.dev/fast
